text: "Today I Killed a Man I Didn't Know" was a top 20 hit in New Zealand for singer Nash Chase. ==Background== The record was released on the HMV label in June 1971. This was Chase's first release for the label.Billboard 12 June 1971 Page 50 International News Reports, Music from the Capitals of the World Wellington N.Z. The single was backed with "World Of Lavender Lace".45cat Nash Chase - Discography The single quickly became a hit on the Top 20 chart. It also became a finalist in the 1971 Loxene Gold Disc awards.Amplifier New Zealand Music Online Pop > Nash Chase ==References== Category:1971 singles Category:1971 songs Category:Nash Chase songs Category:Songs written by Roger Greenaway Category:Songs written by Roger Cook (songwriter)
title: Today I Killed a Man I Didn't Know
